highlights.label: Digital Transformation
highlights.text: Led Agile & SAFe adoption across cross-functional teams, accelerating delivery and optimizing aerospace workflows.

highlights.label: Data-Driven Innovation
highlights.text: Automated critical data pipelines, reducing reporting effort and enhancing strategic decision-making for the MRTT fleet.

highlights.label: Change Management
highlights.text: Driven tech adoption as Management Team member, impacting a 500+ engineering network across the organization.
